ygData.subject: Itms gone, Thanks for playing on "The Price is Right"
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I didn t realize it, but my wife wanted to play a cleric, so I gave her my best stuff. Also, as to the no drop Temple stuff, the screen shot clips from
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I didn't realize it, but my wife wanted to play a cleric, so I
gave her my best stuff.

Also, as to the no drop Temple stuff, the screen shot clips from
AllaKhazam's web site shows them all as tradeable. I will attempt to
complete the quests with my druid and my guildmates just like I did
for the Cleric quest pieces.

I made 3rd level last night. It feels good to be able to melee a mob
to death with a dagger and Shallow Breathe. I know it won't last, but
I will enjoy it while I can. =)

Hi Cai if you are lurking here. Grats to you and Ligge on your guild.

--
Uthanatos <Shadows of the Fallem>
Gnome Enchanter
3rd Cog in the Great Dragon
Fennin
